form.title: Facilitate and monitor your teams' engagement.
form.description: Make Wooclap accessible to all your trainers, meeting moderators and presenters. Thanks to tailor-made support, make Wooclap widely used in your organization.
form.socialProof: 2,000,000 people already use Wooclap on a daily basis

quickPresentation1.title: Assess the level of understanding of participants
quickPresentation1.description: Multiple choice, Poll, and Find a Number questions allow you to find out what your audience thinks and identify trends in a matter of seconds. You can also provide correct answers to assess the overall level of understanding.

quickPresentation2.title: Give your participants the floor
quickPresentation2.description: Invite your participants to answer in their own words using the Open Question, Find a Number, and Word Cloud question-types. The latter displays the most recurring answers in real time.
